description: Number of ways of getting a royal flush, other straight flush, 4 of a kind, full house, other flush, other straight, 3 of a kind, 2 pair, a pair or nothing in 5-card poker.
references: J. Scarne, Scarne's Complete Guide to Gambling, Simon and Schuster, 1961, p. 582.
links: Index entries for sequences related to poker
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Koreen M Mielke (mielkk72(AT)VAXA.CIS.UWOSH.EDU)
